title: mud_box, mud_atlas models not automatically loaded in 2.6

content.raw:
There is no joy in mudville.

In the process of bringing up drcsim 2.6 using

sudo apt-get install drcsim

having deleted .gazebo/models

stuff from mud_box, mud_atlas are missing.

mud_atlas is in /usr/share/drcsim-2.6/gazebo_models/environments but is missing the materials subdirectory. I copied that from a drcsim-2.5 machine.
Why that is necessary is unclear to me since it no longer appears in the mud_atlas/model.sdf, but error messages indicated it was clearly needed.

Appears model://mud_atlas/materials/  is needed in 
worlds/vrc_task_2.world,
worlds/vrc_task_2_stumps.world

I got mud_box using

hg clone https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models gazebo_models

I manually copied mud_box to ~/.gazebo/models
content.html:
There is no joy in mudville.

In the process of bringing up drcsim 2.6 using

sudo apt-get install drcsim

having deleted .gazebo/models

stuff from mud_box, mud_atlas are missing.

mud_atlas is in /usr/share/drcsim-2.6/gazebo_models/environments but is missing the materials subdirectory. I copied that from a drcsim-2.5 machine. Why that is necessary is unclear to me since it no longer appears in the mud_atlas/model.sdf, but error messages indicated it was clearly needed.

Appears model://mud_atlas/materials/ is needed in worlds/vrc_task_2.world, worlds/vrc_task_2_stumps.world

I got mud_box using

hg clone https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models gazebo_models

I manually copied mud_box to ~/.gazebo/models
